summary: Hyperscalers are aggressively increasing AI infrastructure investments, with Microsoft guiding for $50B capex (+41% YoY), Google $49.9B (AI focus), Meta $35-40B (raised guidance), and AWS accelerating spend. GPU rental prices remain stable at $3.19/hr (historically high), indicating sustained demand. Major model releases (GPT-5 mid-2024, Gemini 2 development) further drive optimism.
